com.github.shynixn.ball.api.persistence.controller

Interface IController<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BallController<K,Location,Entity>, BallMetaController, BounceController<Block,Material>, BukkitBallController, IFileController<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BallDataRepository, BallEntityController, BounceObjectController, GUIBallConfiguration

    Controller interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears all items in the repository.
      java.util.List<T> getAll()
      Returns all items from the repository as unmodifiableList.
      void remove()
      Removes an item from the repository.
      int size()
      Returns the amount of items in the repository.
      void store()
      Stores a new a item in the repository.
